text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS tRUMP ignored pandemic report during his transition time in 2016.He eliminated pandemic team in 2018.He said COVID19 is a HOAX that will miraculously disappear in April. 60000+USA citizens deaths isn't a HOAX.
